documents.document: @Ciara_Knight Thank you Ciara. I needed that. And am having some onion bagel to celebrate.

@tanyasweeney Thanks T. I think that once you've supplied facts and they're ignored, it's wilfull ignorance.
I am going to bed now, just in case this ridiculousness continues and it appears I have somehow been cowed into silence. Disgusted.
.@ciarancannon I'm being entirely factual. You, on the other hand, are calling me a liar. You represent our interests. You are accountable.
.@ciarancannon I have told a very clear and, to most right-minded people, shocking, example that was heard by everyone in that audience.
.@ciarancannon Ciaran, your attitude has been appalling. You said you had heard no joke about rape, ergo there are no jokes about rape.
Your public rep still hard@work. Says he's never heard anyone joke about rape. I have. I said so. He doesn't care. https://t.co/2mfDCwlOzo
@stepdoyle ..dragging me into a thread about a separate story. Good luck to you, may your world forever be secure and stable. @Hippoclides
@stepdoyle You weren't interested in 'this Russian' with your original tweets. You were only interested in.. @Hippoclides @thejournal_ie
@TomClonan Wouldn't be just Fine Gael, or even politicians, unfortunately. @Fergal
@Fergal Arrogant beyond belief to presume your life experience encompasses everyone else's.
@alan_maguire It is and was and it isn't the only rape 'joke' I have been exposed to in my life so far. Fine for those who haven't been.
@Fergal Not disputing that rape culture can be aimed at any gender; disputing the claim that it doesn't exist.
@luberachi It was, and it still makes me shake to think of it.
@DeVore I agree. This was an ill-tempered, disgusting rant dressed up as a 'hilarious' response. The anger in the delivery was palpable.

@Donal_OKeeffe @ellieobyrne1 @thejournal_ie 5. .. no control over what goes in the #health vertical or indeed in any of the articles..
@Donal_OKeeffe @ellieobyrne1 @thejournal_ie 4. .. content marked #health. They don't have any contact with editorial though and have ..
